parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF:11240014), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a Senator candidate for AUR,  mentioning his position on the ballot ("Poziția 1 pe buletinul de vot!"). This directly satisfies "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's clearly intended to reach a wide audience, not just a select few. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's primary objective is to encourage voters to vote for Dan Cosma and AUR. Phrases like "Un vot pentru viitorul nostru," "Haideți la urne!", and "La parlamentare, votați AUR" explicitly aim to influence voting behavior. This strongly suggests an electoral objective, fulfilling "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, exceeding the bounds of personal expression.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1551664468825639</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria of electoral propaganda as defined by LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, Art 36 (7). It refers to a specific candidate (Dan Cosma), is used during the electoral campaign period (judging by the CMF number and the call to vote), has a clear electoral objective (influencing votes for AUR), and goes beyond journalistic reporting by directly advocating for a specific candidate.  The presence of the CMF number further strengthens the case that this is regulated electoral propaganda. The post's call to action ("Haideți la urne!", "La parlamentare, votați AUR") leaves no doubt about its intention to influence the vote.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>DAN COSMA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Responsabilul pentru postarea plătită], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID-ul postării: 1551664468825639) cu conținut electoral care promovează candidatura lui Dan Cosma pentru AUR,  folosind fraze precum "Un vot pentru viitorul nostru", "Haideți la urne!", și "La parlamentare, votați AUR", având ca efect electoral influențarea voturilor în favoarea candidatului și partidului menționat. Postarea conține, de asemenea, numărul CMF: 11240014, indicând clar natura sa de propagandă electorală.  Această acțiune constituie o încălcare clară a legii, deoarece continuă propaganda electorală după încheierea perioadei legale.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
